pr_title: fix(griffin): fixed internal error while aggregating on hour with where clause.

timeline.message:
fix(griffin): fixed internal error while aggregating on hour with where clause.

Inverted isValidColumnName method. It was always used with ! operator

timeline.author: jaugsburger

replies.bodyText:
Function names are case sensitive. Reason i changed that is because this SQL would work:
select HOUR(ts), count() from tab
and this SQL would not:
select HOUR(ts), count() from tab where y > 0.5
in this PR neither would work, which is consistent. On other hand both of these would work:
select hour(ts), count() from tab
select hour(ts), count() from tab where y > 0.5
replies.author: bluestreak01
